conceptOrigin.title: üîπ I. Concept Origin
conceptOrigin.alpha: ‚Ä¢ Alpha in finance = excess returns, representing the core competitiveness of investment strategies.
conceptOrigin.morality: ‚Ä¢ Morality/Ethics emphasizes public welfare, charity, social responsibility, belonging to values and civilization levels.
conceptOrigin.version: ‚Ä¢ 3.0 signifies an upgrade: from profit-oriented ‚Üí win-win oriented ‚Üí civilization-oriented.

evolutionLogic.title: üîπ II. Evolution Logic
evolutionLogic.v1: ‚Ä¢ Moral Alpha 1.0 ‚Üí Charitable Donations: wealth and goodwill separated, make money first then donate.
evolutionLogic.v2: ‚Ä¢ Moral Alpha 2.0 ‚Üí ESG Investment: balancing returns with social responsibility, but still enterprise-focused.
evolutionLogic.v3:
‚Ä¢ Moral Alpha 3.0 ‚Üí Algorithm-driven √ó Embedded Charity √ó Global Co-construction:
Wealth growth and human goodwill are no longer separated, but dual returns of the same algorithm.
evolutionLogic.conclusion: Wealth growth and human goodwill are no longer separated, but dual returns of the same algorithm.

narrativeDefinition.title: üîπ III. Narrative Definition
narrativeDefinition.desc1: AI + Blockchain driven excess return model,
narrativeDefinition.desc2: where excess portions not only convert to profits, but automatically flow into charitable civilization funds,
narrativeDefinition.mechanismDesc: In this system, morality itself is a type of Alpha. Stronger goodwill ‚Üí Greater consensus ‚Üí Wider capital flow ‚Üí Higher investment returns.

motto.title: üîπ V. Motto
motto.quote1: In the world of Moral Alpha 3.0, goodwill is no longer an extra cost, but the source of excess returns.
motto.quote2: Capital flows through algorithms and transcends through morality.
motto.quote3: Alpha is not just about excess returns, but the evolutionary dividend of financial civilization.

conclusion.title: üìå Conclusion
conclusion.content1: Moral Alpha 3.0 can be designed as one of USD.online's philosophical cores, explaining why the project doesn't simply pursue profit, but integrates wealth + charity + civilization co-construction as a trinity.
conclusion.content2: Moral Alpha 3.0 = Perfect fusion of wealth civilization and charitable civilization

whitepaper.title: USD.online ¬∑ Whitepaper
whitepaper.subtitle: Unleashing Algorithmic Freedom ¬∑ Converging Global Liquidity ¬∑ Illuminating the Light of Human Kindness

preface.title: Preface
preface.content1: Human financial civilization is standing at a new threshold.
preface.content2: As AI becomes the main theme of our era, capital is no longer just cold numbers‚Äîit is the flow of narratives, the power of consensus, and the language of algorithms.
preface.content3: The birth of USD.online is not a simple innovation in charity, but a symphony of wealth civilization and human civilization. It echoes between contribution and philanthropy, turning every yield into warmth and protection for children with autism around the world.
preface.point1: ‚Ä¢ Yield from contribution = The power of public good
preface.point2: ‚Ä¢ Capital flows = The surging of kindness
preface.point3: ‚Ä¢ Wealth accumulation = The resonance of the world
preface.conclusion: USD.online is not only a stage for capital and philanthropy, but also a new chapter in human civilization.

vision.title: Project Vision
vision.content1: The mission of USD.online goes beyond maximizing returns‚Äîit aims to shape a new order where financial civilization and philanthropic spirit are intertwined.
vision.point1: ‚Ä¢ Algorithms become the language of freedom
vision.point2: ‚Ä¢ Narratives become the source of wealth
vision.point3: ‚Ä¢ Capital becomes the pulse of the world
vision.point4: ‚Ä¢ Public good becomes the brilliance of humanity
vision.conclusion: USD.online will stand as the builder of a dual order: global liquidity and human kindness. Here, wealth walks hand in hand with humanity, and technology advances side by side with philanthropy.

mission.title: Philanthropic Mission
mission.content1: The financial logic and charitable logic of USD.online are deeply coupled. We have chosen global autism care programs for children as the core direction of our philanthropy.
mission.commitment1: ‚Ä¢ A portion of net platform revenue ‚Üí Dedicated donations to global autism foundations
mission.commitment2: ‚Ä¢ On-chain disclosure ‚Üí Every donation flow is transparent and traceable, making "kindness visible, trust verifiable"
mission.value1: ‚Ä¢ Every donation is a seed of care
mission.value2: ‚Ä¢ Every yield is an echo of life
mission.value3: ‚Ä¢ Every contributor is a co-builder of public good
mission.conclusion: USD.online believes: capital does not only create wealth, it should also kindle the warmth of humanity.

strategy.title: Strategic Horizon
strategy.content1: The significance of USD.online goes beyond contribution. It is the convergence point of wealth civilization and philanthropic civilization:
strategy.point1: ‚Ä¢ It is an experimental ground for financial narratives
strategy.point2: ‚Ä¢ It is the confluence of technology and humanity
strategy.point3: ‚Ä¢ It is the symphony of global capital and philanthropic spirit
strategy.conclusion: The existence of USD.online is not just a tool for wealth accumulation‚Äîit is a collective leap forward in human financial civilization. What it creates is not only wealth, but a new paradigm of finance that resonates with humanity.

conclusion.title: Conclusion ¬∑ Wealth Beyond Profit, Capital in Harmony with Charity
conclusion.content1: USD.online is not only the engine of wealth, but also the bridge of kindness.
conclusion.content2: It unites capital, AI technology, and philanthropy into one, converging into a financial civilization of the human future.
conclusion.content3: It is not merely a donation platform‚Äîit is a declaration of humanity's co-built civilization on-chain.

projectIntro.title: üöÄ USD.online ¬∑ Project Introduction
projectIntro.subtitle: AI-Powered Global Liquidity Civilization Engine
projectIntro.transformation: The global financial system is undergoing a transformation unseen in a century:
projectIntro.point1: ‚Ä¢ Collapse of the Bretton Woods trust system
projectIntro.point2: ‚Ä¢ Digital extension of US dollar hegemony
projectIntro.point3: ‚Ä¢ Algorithmic civilization waves driven by AI
projectIntro.backdrop: Against this backdrop, USD.online is not just a platform, but an experimental ground for a new global capital order. It merges Wall Street's quantitative wisdom, Web3's decentralization spirit, and AI's intelligent computation into an international financial engine that transcends investment itself.

painPoints.title: Market Pain Points
painPoints.traditionalDesc: Cross-border capital flows are restricted by central banks, commercial banks, and clearing systems.
painPoints.cryptoDesc: CEX and DEX liquidity is siloed, with narratives lacking lasting value anchors.

fcaRegulation.title: UK FCA Regulatory Endorsement ¬∑ Global Trust Foundation
fcaRegulation.intro: USD.online / Blue Light Compassion Coin has obtained compliance filing and regulatory authorization from the UK Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).
fcaRegulation.description1: The FCA is one of the world's strictest and most respected financial regulatory bodies, with its regulatory framework hailed as the "golden standard of financial civilization."
fcaRegulation.description2: Obtaining FCA regulation not only signifies the project's legality and transparency but also represents its entry into the core circle of international capital and charitable financial civilization.
fcaRegulation.compliance: üìú Legal Compliance: Project operations follow UK and international financial regulatory frameworks
fcaRegulation.transparency: üîç Public Transparency: All key data and fund flows are traceable and verifiable
fcaRegulation.protection: üõ° Investment Protection: FCA regulation provides legal protection for global investors and charity partners
fcaRegulation.passport: üåç International Passport: FCA license is regarded as a "trust passport" in global capital markets
fcaRegulation.strategicIntro: With FCA certification, USD.online is not just a digital asset project:
fcaRegulation.anchor: ‚Ä¢ It is a trusted anchor point for global charitable financial civilization
fcaRegulation.testbed: ‚Ä¢ It is a compliant testing ground for AI √ó Blockchain √ó Charity integration
fcaRegulation.cornerstone: ‚Ä¢ It is the compliant cornerstone of the new generation capital order
fcaRegulation.conclusion: "FCA regulation empowers USD.online, making wealth and goodwill safer, more transparent, and more credible globally."

staking.title: Staking & Returns
staking.linear: ‚Ä¢ Returns accumulate linearly and can be claimed anytime.

fees.title: Management Fees & Early Withdrawal
fees.managementFee: ‚Ä¢ Management fee: 1% of deposit amount, goes to feeWallet.
fees.earlyWithdrawal: ‚Ä¢ Early withdrawal: 40% penalty (on principal), goes to feeWallet; rewards are not penalized and automatically distributed.

invite.title: Referral & Level System
invite.binding: ‚Ä¢ Binding: First deposit ‚â•200U required for binding, short code ‚Üí address mapping; cannot be changed after binding, allows self-referral/circular referrals.
invite.teamStaking: ‚Ä¢ Team total staking: Real-time sum of net principal under custody for self + direct referrals + next level down (A+B+C); deducted upon redemption; used only for level determination.
invite.levelChange: ‚Ä¢ Level changes only affect future deposits, no retroactive adjustments.

settlement.title: Reward Settlement & Fund Flow
settlement.rewardBase: ‚Ä¢ Reward base: Calculated on gross deposit amount A (before 1% deduction).
settlement.distribution: ‚Ä¢ Distribution form: Each deposit immediately records into "claimable balance" (USDT), not immediate transfer.

usdo.title: USDo Stablecoin Mechanism
usdo.totalSupply: ‚Ä¢ Total supply cap: 100,000,000 tokens; decimals: 6 (consistent with USDT).
usdo.mintingRule: ‚Ä¢ Minting rule: Only minted during user self-investment at 5 USDo / 1 USDT instantly; does not participate in referral rewards.
usdo.capProtection: ‚Ä¢ Cap protection: If current deposit would exceed the limit, reject the deposit.
usdo.transferSwitch: ‚Ä¢ Transfer switch: USDo can be normally transferred and traded after the owner-controlled switch is enabled.
usdo.narrative: ‚Ä¢ Narrative: USDo targets stablecoin scenarios, with future plans for 1:1 USD exchange experience and clearing channels.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: Q: Can I bind subordinates without initial deposit? A: No, you need an initial deposit ‚â•200U to bind.
faq.q2: Q: How long for rewards to arrive? A: Immediately recorded in "claimable balance" after deposit, can be claimed anytime.
faq.q3: Q: Does early withdrawal affect earned rewards? A: No, rewards are not penalized, only 40% penalty on principal.
faq.q4: Q: Does USDo give referral rewards? A: No, USDo is only for self-investment minting.

example.title: Example
example.scenario: User A deposits 1,000U (any staking period selected):
example.reward: ‚Ä¢ If superior is Lv3, direct referral reward = 12% √ó 1,000 = 120U; superior's superior gets 10% √ó 120 = 12U.
example.split: ‚Ä¢ Remaining amount after fees and rewards undergoes 50%/50% split.
example.usdo: ‚Ä¢ USDo minting: 5,000 USDo recorded for A; does not affect reward settlement.
